## goup-util ensure-workspace

Ensure a module is included in the workspace

### Synopsis

Ensure that a specific module is included in the Go workspace.

The module path should be relative to the workspace root.

```
goup-util ensure-workspace <module-path> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --force   Force addition to workspace
  -h, --help    help for ensure-workspace
```

### SEE ALSO

* [goup-util](goup-util.md)	 - A CLI tool for managing Android and iOS SDKs
